about_the_game:
WELCOME TO
SEARCH and RESCUE | MOUNT RAINIER NATIONAL PARK
WASHINGTON.USA

This wonderful Park was established on March 2 1899 around sleeping volcano Mount Reinier.
Located in Washington State, United States of America, majestic Mt Rainer is well visible from Seattle or Portland.
It`s the fifth oldest National Park in USA
Park`s Size - 594 395 square kilometers and 97% of it is designated as Wilderness.

Before You visit Mount Rainier National Park, make sure to prepare accordingly - Knowledge and Equipement
This game is about helping each other, about heroes and great respect for Nature and National Parks.

This DLC brings:
❅ New Map - Size Huge
❅ New type of locations like Watch Towers
❅ New Cards

Make sure to check other DLC:
❅ Dogs
❅ Yosemite National Park

Wishlist and Follow SEARCH and RESCUE for Updates.
See You on trails and stay safe!

PS.: Thanks to great Mount Rainier National Park Service for support and their hard work taking care of the Mount Rainier National Park. All the best!
detailed_description:
WELCOME TO
SEARCH and RESCUE | MOUNT RAINIER NATIONAL PARK
WASHINGTON.USA

This wonderful Park was established on March 2 1899 around sleeping volcano Mount Reinier.
Located in Washington State, United States of America, majestic Mt Rainer is well visible from Seattle or Portland.
It`s the fifth oldest National Park in USA
Park`s Size - 594 395 square kilometers and 97% of it is designated as Wilderness.

Before You visit Mount Rainier National Park, make sure to prepare accordingly - Knowledge and Equipement
This game is about helping each other, about heroes and great respect for Nature and National Parks.

This DLC brings:
❅ New Map - Size Huge
❅ New type of locations like Watch Towers
❅ New Cards

Make sure to check other DLC:
❅ Dogs
❅ Yosemite National Park

Wishlist and Follow SEARCH and RESCUE for Updates.
See You on trails and stay safe!

PS.: Thanks to great Mount Rainier National Park Service for support and their hard work taking care of the Mount Rainier National Park. All the best!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
